# CANONIC Apps

inherits: /CANONIC/

> The CANONIC App Store. Certified applications for the CANONVERSE.

## Repos

| Repo | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| [AGENT](https://github.com/canonic-apps/AGENT) | Entry point, identity |
| [CHAT](https://github.com/canonic-apps/CHAT) | Self-governance |
| [EVOLUTION](https://github.com/canonic-apps/EVOLUTION) | Change tracking |
| [STORE](https://github.com/canonic-apps/STORE) | App distribution |

## System Apps

```
CANONIC INSTANCE = AGENT ∩ CHAT ∩ EVOLUTION
```
